snippet.title: Garden Story - Trailer (Coming Summer 2021)
snippet.description:
✨ Wishlist Garden Story on Steam: http://bit.ly/viewgardenstory

Garden Story is an indie action-RPG that invites players to unify a broken community as the newly-appointed Guardian of The Grove. Traverse a vibrant island to combat invasive Rot, inspire its inhabitants, and rebuild your home. 

Garden Story releases on Steam and Nintendo Switch in Summer 2021! 🍇
---------------------
✨ Follow Garden Story on Twitter: https://twitter.com/gardenstorygame
✨ Join our official Discord Server: https://discord.gg/rosecitygames
✨ Learn more about Rose City Games: https://www.rosecitygames.com/
